page.title: 09HOLY TRINITY CHURCH
page.content: When we went to the church we met the Archdeacon Celwyn Clos Parry. When you get to the church first of all you have to walk through the lychgate. The lychgate was there in the olden days because when there was a funeral they would rest the coffin along the gate and then the vicar come out and they would then be able to start the funeral. We then walked around the back of the church talking about the windows, not one of the windows is the same and at the top of the windows there were engravements of faces of famous people. They were very artistically engraved. After looking around the outside of the church we went inside and most of the church was made of marble. The windows were very nicely coloured and all the designs came from the Bible.
